sourcesContent:
<template>
  <v-container class="fill-height" fluid>
    <v-row align="center" justify="center">
      <v-col cols="12" sm="8" md="8" xl="4">
        <v-card dark class="elevation-12">
          <v-toolbar color="primary" flat>
            <v-toolbar-title>Добавление сообщения</v-toolbar-title>
          </v-toolbar>
          <v-card-text>
            <v-form>
              <v-text-field
                label="User Name "
                prepend-icon="mdi-account"
                type="text"
                :rules="userNameRules"
              ></v-text-field>
              <v-text-field label="E-mail" prepend-icon="mdi-email" type="text" :rules="emailRules"></v-text-field>
              <v-text-field label="Homepage" prepend-icon="mdi-home" type="text"></v-text-field>
              <v-textarea label="Text" name="login" prepend-icon="mdi-text" type="text"></v-textarea>
            </v-form>
          </v-card-text>
          <v-card-actions>
            <v-btn color="success">Добавить</v-btn>
            <v-btn color="secondary">Очистить</v-btn>
            <v-spacer></v-spacer>
            <v-btn to="/messages" color="primary">Отмена</v-btn>
          </v-card-actions>
        </v-card>
      </v-col>
    </v-row>
  </v-container>
</template>

<script>
export default {
  name: "CreateMessage",
  data() {
    return {
      // Validation
      userNameRules: [
        (v) => !!v || "User Name обязателен для заполнения",
        (v) =>
          this.validateUserName(v) ||
          "User Name должен содержать цифры и буквы латинского алфавита",
      ],
      emailRules: [
        (v) => !!v || "Email обязателен для заполнения",
        (v) =>
          this.validateEmail(v) ||
          "Email не соответствует формату электронной почты",
      ],
    };
  },
  methods: {
    validateUserName(userName) {
      const regex = /[0-9]{1,}([a-z]){1,}|([a-z]){1,}[0-9]{1,}|[a-z]{1,}/gi;
      return regex.exec(userName) !== null;
    },
    validateEmail(email) {
      const regex = /^(?("")("".+?(?<!\\)""@)|(([0-9a-z]((\.(?!\.))|[-!#\$%&'\*\+/=\?\^`\{\}\|~\w])*)(?<=[0-9a-z_-])@))/gi;
      return regex.exec(email) !== null;
    },
    validateURL(url) {
      // validate URL in `this.myimage`
      try {
        new URL(url).toString();
        return true;
      } catch (e) {
        return false;
      }
    },
  },
  created() {
    let url = "41654asd";

    const regex = /[0-9]{1,}([a-z]){1,}|([a-z]){1,}[0-9]{1,}|[a-z]{1,}/gi;
    const matches = regex.exec(url);
    console.info(matches);
  },
};
</script>
